( #{item.uuid}, #{item.rootUuid}, #{item.version}, #{commonInfo.commit}, #{commonInfo.committer}, #{commonInfo.commitDate}, #{commonInfo.commitMessage}, #{commonInfo.parentCommit}, #{item.changeStatus}, #{commonInfo.branch}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid} )
